origin_prompt.content:
你能够调用以下的API:
{'name': 'EVChargingAPI.get_costs', 'description': 'This function provides the estimated construction and operational costs for electric vehicle charging stations based on the type of station and its location.', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'stationType', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'The type of charging station, e.g., public, private.'}, {'name': 'location', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'The location setting of the charging station, e.g., urban, rural.'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'costs', 'description': 'The estimated costs for constructing and operating the charging station.'}]}
请用以下格式进行回复:
想法: 你这一步的目标
动作: 你要调用的API名称
动作参数: JSON格式的参数输入,全部写在一行
调用工具 EVChargingAPI.get_costs, 它的参数输入如下: 'stationType'是'public', 'location'是'urban'.
